item.title: Obsidian
item.description: Obsidian Obsidian is a [[Second Brain]] and note taking app. It is a powerful and extensible knowledge base that works on top of your local folder of plain text files.

item.title: Second Brain
item.description: After mastering the process of [[Smart Note Taking]], the next step is to put it into a sustainable system. The best format I found was the [[Second Brain]].

item.title: Sönke Ahrens
item.description: Author or [[Smart Note Taking (Sönke Ahrens)]] first to lumens [[Zettelkasten]] system and the benefit of not collecting notes, but using them interlinked Origin: [[Smart Note Taking (Sönke Ahrens)]]
